interviewer_dialogue: Hi, this is Interviewer, the landlord.

patient_dialogue: Hi, this is Patient, your tenant.

interviewer_dialogue: Uhm.. I'm sorry, I haven't had enough time to get over to fix it, I've been very busy.

I can- I can assist, you know, I fixing the problem uh.. you know, uh.. but uh.. I think we should, you know, get something done here before it gets too bad.
So can you send uh.. someone else besides you or do you just want to authorize, you know, kind of work that I can do to get this situation better?
